welcome_message_body: Welcome to Kawaguchi, Japan! Known for its stunning views of Mount Fuji and its beautiful cherry blossoms, we invite you to explore and enjoy the city's charm and natural beauty during your visit.

restaurants.name: Syoutaien (正泰苑 総本店)
restaurants.description: Syoutaien (正泰苑 総本店) is a bbq joint located in 荒川区.

restaurants.name: 鈴木製作所
restaurants.description: 鈴木製作所 is a café located in 荒川区.

restaurants.name: 分上野薮 かねこ
restaurants.description: 分上野薮 かねこ is a soba restaurant located in さいたま市.
restaurants.address: 浦和区仲町2-9-11, さいたま市, 埼玉県, 330-0062

restaurants.name: タイ国料理 ライカノ
restaurants.description: タイ国料理 ライカノ is a thai restaurant located in 足立区.
restaurants.address: 千住2-62 (ラ・フェットビル 1F), 足立区, 東京都, 120-0034

restaurants.name: Michela (ミケーラ)
restaurants.description: Michela (ミケーラ) is a buffet located in さいたま市.
restaurants.address: 浦和区仲町2-5-1 (浦和ロイヤルパインズホテル1F), さいたま市, 埼玉県, 330-0063

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free Wi-Fi network for up to 3 hours.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Yokota AFB Airport handles both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Yokota AFB Airport is used for transporting goods and supplies.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
